Judul: THE ROLE OF SATOE INDONESIA ORGANIZATION IN STUDENT SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY, Study Case: Increasing Education Economic Condition In Pasir Jambu
Abstrak:
Abstract :  
 
 

Solving education and economic problems in Indonesia never been done completely. It shown with many either societies member still cannot get the opportunities to feel formally or informally education so it caused weaker society economy. Education is main factor in building a nation. By increasing educational quality in a country, so the states economy developed by it self because it has high quality of human resource The main question is where Indonesia future is if the education and economic problem cannot solve and whose actually are responsible to the condition it is government, university student, or society as a holistic. The solution to solve this education and economic problem will discuss in this final project The topic of this final project The Role of Satoe Indonesia Organization in Student Social Responsibility, Study Case: Increasing education and economic condition in Pasir Jambu Village. Interview, Observation and literature Study done to gather all data and information from university student activity and the impact to the society and compare it with Satoe Indonesia organization activity and the impact to Pasir Jambu society and society in general Founded that Satoe Indonesia activity make a positif impact to society rather than these two organization AIESEC and HMTM PATRA however Satoe Indonesia still have deficiency in internal activity so from these analysis the author collaborate the activity among the organization to make new invention so can create a bigger impact to society The method called Student Social Responsibility it about social responsibility from student that done strategically and adopted the concept of community development so can create a sustainable development and give positive impact to external and internal organization. The student responsibility is not only learning but also do a social thing to society. From this formula the author suggest to all university student organization to adapt this method to solve the education and economi problem in Indonesia

Kata Kunci: Student Social Responsibility, Community Development, University Student, Student Organization
